DdMd::TwoStepIntegrator Class Reference
MD Integrators

Detailed Description

A two-step velocity-Verlet style integrator.

virtual void DdMd::TwoStepIntegrator::integrateStep1 ( ) [protected, pure virtual]

Execute first step of two-step integrator.

The function simulation().modifySignal().notify() is called immediately after this function in the run method, so this function need not send this signal.

Implemented in DdMd::NphIntegrator, DdMd::NptIntegrator, DdMd::NveIntegrator, and DdMd::NvtIntegrator.

Referenced by run().

virtual void DdMd::TwoStepIntegrator::integrateStep2 ( ) [protected, pure virtual]

Execute secodn step of two-step integrator.

This method must call simulation().velocitySignal().notify() if it modifies the velocities.

Implemented in DdMd::NphIntegrator, DdMd::NptIntegrator, DdMd::NveIntegrator, and DdMd::NvtIntegrator.

Referenced by run().
